txt.en: 'Is there a queue for the forge or something?'
The leader of the Weaponsmith's Guild has asked you to forge a pommel to fill an order from the leader of the Metalsmith's Guild.
The crafting recipes you must create can be bartered for from the Improved Recipes vendor.\n\nMake a guild-pattern pommel.
Execute the recipe for a guild-pattern pommel
'A proper pommel will balance out the weight from the blade. Engrave the Metalsmith Guild's insignia on it. It'll be a nice touch.'
'Is there a queue for the forge or something?'
Executed the recipe for a guild-pattern pommel
'A proper pommel will balance out the weight from the blade. Engrave the Metalsmith Guild's insignia on it. It'll be a nice touch.'
Turn in a guild-pattern pommel ([placeholder]/[placeholder]) to Cottar Tunnelly
'These seem simple, but if you get it wrong you'll throw off the balance on the finished sword.'
Talk to the Weaponsmith's Guild Leader in Minas Morgul
Turn in a guild-pattern pommel ([placeholder]/[placeholder]) to the Weaponsmith's Guild Leader in Minas Morgul
'These seem simple, but if you get it wrong you'll throw off the balance on the finished sword.'
